Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: a starlike object that moved erratically and fast
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Grand Island
There were no other sightings in Grand Island on or around September 18th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsWe had just finished playing bridge at my house and the players were leaving when one of them came running back in and said there was a UFO in the sky. Oh sure. We went out and sure enough there was a star-like object moving erratically in the sky overhead. It would stay still and then swiftly move in one direction and then just as quickly move in another direction. We watched it until we were tired of it. I dont know how much longer it was there but we watched for at least 15 minutes in the front of my house. There were four of us. The one who called us out said she had seen the same thing once before. The person who first saw it was not a starwatcher. She just happened to notice the unusual movement.
